Text:
When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, Stark starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

there is some angles here is there but did best could without losing much more vid
audio is pretty good. IMHO... tis a sexy encode 

This is an original XVID File!



http://imgbox.com/g/O03aLjDSb2

Welp its not fake, scanned with all the appropriate Virus scans, eg. Avast, AVG, blah blah. Its clean.

As for quality, Its a CAM copy, the quality of the cam FOR a cam is 7V 8A FOR a cam. Its a little dark, and a tiny bit shakey on occasion. Watchable. For a Cam you'd be hard pressed to get better.
for a cam the quality is 1/2 decent BUT it skips alot of scenes making it hard for someone to follow if they havent already seen the movie

This is a "decent" copy.

A: 6
V: 5 1/2

Of course, with a CAM, you WILL have a few dark
scenes that are DARK. LOL.

Thx for the UL. Very watchable if you can't wait.

Due to the fact that my sight is steadily getting worse by the day, I abhor dark scenes that get even darker in some CAM... Therefore I have no other option than to get depressed and wait for a better copy to appear b4 I get totally blind.
